Package board

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
board.Cell
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
Cells represent each block in the chess board. Each board.Cell contain the coordinate of row,col,col. Contains the name of the piece such as "wp","bk". Empty indicator to check if each cell is empty or not. A char to indicate its a white cell or a black board. And each board.Cell could store a piece. Each Cell store the en passant status for current cell.
